attributes.action: provide Lisburn City Council (Northern Ireland) with enough funding to erect an indoor or out door skateboarding and BMX-ing track.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The last time the council supplied 1 jump for skateboarding and it was'nt exactly safe.There isnt much for the youth to do in Lisburn. Now would it not be a good idea to suply them with something to keep them out of the town centre? After all, the council is crying about them hanging about the Linen Museum.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
